languages.text: {n}Меченый невольник фыркает.{/n} "Замысловато плетешь. Ты какая-то госпожа, что ли? Только господа отказываются распознать смерть, когда она им в глаза заглядывает — больно верят в свою удачу".

{n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."
languages.original_text: {n}Меченый невольник фыркает.{/n} "Замысловато плетешь. Ты какая-то госпожа, что ли? Только господа отказываются распознать смерть, когда она им в глаза заглядывает — больно верят в свою удачу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."
traits.speaker: Marked

traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}那个满脸伤疤的囚犯哼了一声。{/n}“听你这些话，我的耳朵都要起茧子了。你还真能摆贵族架子啊，是吧？只有那些高高在上的大人物，才会拒绝面对死亡。他们相信好运会始终伴随他们，直到最后都不肯醒悟。”
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个满脸伤疤的囚犯哼了一声。{/n}“听你这些话，我的耳朵都要起茧子了。你还真能摆贵族架子啊，是吧？只有那些高高在上的大人物，才会拒绝面对死亡。他们相信好运会始终伴随他们，直到最后都不肯醒悟。”
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}印のつけられた囚人があざ笑う。{/n}「お前の話を聞いていると耳が痛くなるようだ。あんたは、どこぞのお嬢さんかい？死を目の当たりにしてもそれを認識しようとしないのは、偉大な人と善人だけさ…そういう連中は、その最後の瞬間まで自分の運を信じてやがる」
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}印のつけられた囚人があざ笑う。{/n}「お前の話を聞いていると耳が痛くなるようだ。あんたは、どこぞのお嬢さんかい？死を目の当たりにしてもそれを認識しようとしないのは、偉大な人と善人だけさ…そういう連中は、その最後の瞬間まで自分の運を信じてやがる」
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}El prisionero marcado se burla.{/n} «Solo de oírle se me anudan los oídos. Es una noble, ¿verdad? Solo los grandes y los buenos se niegan a reconocer la muerte cuando les mira a los ojos. Creen en su suerte hasta el fin».
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}El prisionero marcado se burla.{/n} «Solo de oírle se me anudan los oídos. Es una noble, ¿verdad? Solo los grandes y los buenos se niegan a reconocer la muerte cuando les mira a los ojos. Creen en su suerte hasta el fin».
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier marqué pousse un grognement dédaigneux.{/n} « J'ai les oreilles qui saignent à vous écouter. Vous êtes de la haute, je me trompe ? Il n'y a que les plus grands pour refuser de voir la mort en face... Jusqu'au bout, ils croient pouvoir réussir à s'en tirer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prisonnier marqué pousse un grognement dédaigneux.{/n} « J'ai les oreilles qui saignent à vous écouter. Vous êtes de la haute, je me trompe ? Il n'y a que les plus grands pour refuser de voir la mort en face... Jusqu'au bout, ils croient pouvoir réussir à s'en tirer. »
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}In der Stimme des gebrandmarkten Mannes liegt Spott.{/n} "Euch anzuhören verstopft mir die Ohren. Ihr seid eine ganz schöne Lady, was? Nur die Großen und die Gütigen erkennen den Tod nicht an, wenn er ihnen ins Auge blickt – sie glauben bis zum Schluss ans eigene Glück."
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Stimme des gebrandmarkten Mannes liegt Spott.{/n} "Euch anzuhören verstopft mir die Ohren. Ihr seid eine ganz schöne Lady, was? Nur die Großen und die Gütigen erkennen den Tod nicht an, wenn er ihnen ins Auge blickt – sie glauben bis zum Schluss ans eigene Glück."
traits.speaker: Marked

languages.text: {n}İşaretli mahkûm, alaylı bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Seni dinlemek, kulaklarımı büzüştürüyor. Hakikaten soylu bir hanımefendisin ha? Sadece üst mertebedekiler ve iyi yetişmiş olanlar, ölümün gözlerinin içine bakıp onu reddedebilir. Yolun sonuna kadar şanslı olduklarına inanırlar."
languages.original_text: {n}The marked prisoner scoffs.{/n} "Listening to you leaves my ears in knots. Some kind of a lady, are you? Only the great and the good refuse to recognise death when it looks them in the eye — they believe in their own luck to the very end."

traits.locale_text: {n}İşaretli mahkûm alaylı bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Seni dinlemek kulaklarımı büzüştürüyor. Hakikaten soylu bir hanımefendi falansın ha? Sadece üst mertebedekiler ve iyi yetişmiş olanlar ölümün gözlerinin içine bakıp onu reddedebilir. Yolun sonuna kadar şanslı olduklarına inanırlar."
traits.speaker: Marked
